title: EAN code / barcode
content:
hello,  
does anybody knows a free reliable barcode maker/utility? or just cheap?  
thank you!
author: tikitown40

comments.content: Go to Versiontracker.com and search on barcode
I use Barcode Producer. Not a freebie, but it has been reliable and works well.
Once I learned how to read the second part of EAN-13 – without looking at numbers :-)
